      • run

        public static Exec.ExecResult run(java.lang.String[] cmd,
                  java.lang.String stdin,
                  long timeout,
                  boolean needsLogging,
                  java.lang.String resultCharset)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Runs the given command with the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        cmd - Command line with arguments
        stdin - Input to be fed via stdin
        timeout - Timeout of the process. Value 0 disables timeout.
        needsLogging - used to indicate whether logging should be enabled or disabled
        resultCharset - name of the Charset used to read the output
        Returns:
        The result of the process execution
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
